Packages 
Package Description
edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod
Implements a service client & content viewer app for the NASA APOD web service.
edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.controller
Controller classes handling user navigation and interaction with APOD media content, a list of APOD records stored in the local database, and a date-time picker.
edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.model
Classes and interfaces defining the data model.
edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.model.dao
Interfaces declaring data access object (DAO) types with Room-based CRUD methods for entities.
edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.model.entity
Entity classes mapped to SQLite tables and JSON documents, using Room and Gson annotations.
edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.service
Interfaces and classes defining services for background processing (for database operations and web service requests) and fragment management.
edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.view
Classes that construct visual representations of individual Apod instances and lists of those instances.
